import React, { useState } from 'react' import {SelectedDetailsState} from '../Context/SelectedDetails' import {Element, CardElement, useElement, useStripe} from "@stripe/react-stripe-js" import { loadStripe } from '@stripe/stripe-js'; import axios from 'axios'; const PaymentPage = () => { const {selectedPlan} = SelectedDetailsState(); const [cardNumber,setCardNumber] = useState(""); const [exp,setExp] = useState(""); const [cvc,setCvc] = useState(""); const stripe = useStripe(); const elements = useElements(); return (
Complete Payment
{/*
Enter your credit or debit card details
*/} {/*
{setCardNumber(e.target.value)}}/> {setExp(e.target.value)}}/> {setCvc(e.target.value)}}/>
*/}
Order Summary
Plan Name
{selectedPlan.name}
Billing Cycle
{selectedPlan.period}
Plan price
₹{selectedPlan.price}/mo
) } export default PaymentPage
